name: Stack

props.name: wrap
props.description:
If `true`, children wrap when they run out of space. Defaults to
`true` for `row`, `false` for `column`.

props.name: alignX
props.description: Horizontal placement of the stack when not full width.

props.name: preset
props.description: One or many style-preset names registered via `definePreset()`

props.name: gap
props.description: Inter-child spacing as units or CSS length.

props.name: pad
props.description: Container padding as units or CSS length.

props.name: compact
props.description: Compact mode zeros gap and pad where supported.

props.name: density
props.description: Density override for spacing scale; defaults from nearest Surface.

bestPractices: Use for one‑dimensional layouts (rows/columns) with consistent gaps.
Switch direction responsively and keep spacing tokenized; avoid fixed pixel gaps.
Align items intentionally and avoid mixing diverse alignments within the same group.
Prefer `Grid` for complex two‑dimensional layouts and `Table` for data.
